title: MD
biography: Avian metapneumovirus (aMPV), also known as turkey rhinotracheitis or swollen head syndrome, causes a variety of disease syndromes in birds, depending on the bird species and virus type.
aiSummary: Shobha Broor is a viral diagnostics in india specialist with an H-index of 46 at Virology (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Lancet (London, England), Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
